Making people aware is important, but more important is to convert awareness into action. Clean India - Is attitude change more important than the movement?
Awareness is always a good thing which paves for something better.Ones Personal attitude,contribution means a lot in the achievement of something unique and specific.Likewise Indian government has come  up with "Swach Bharath ",initiative for clean and healthy India.

     As a part of the campaign,its the responsibility of each and every citizen of India to contribute their best inorder to make healthier living.In contrast their are people who are illetrate and who can never know the importance of cleanliness and how that impacts their lives.However one can be the volunteer by visitiing the rural areas,cities were the cleanliness is much needed inorder to safeguard the lives of people.

     Being a part of the campaign,one can plan up the schedule and events in a way which actually helps the people to understand the importance of protecting and safeguarding the surroundings.Educating people in every aspect can conrtibute to the better india were the death rates due to diseases caused by the untideness can be reduced.

      While,Attitude plays a significant role in implementing ones contribution effectively. One should take necessary steps to protect the soil,air,land ,water as it may have an adverse effect if not taken care.One must practice the good habits pertaining to maintaing clean and hygienic environment
